The Definitive Tap Water Safety Guide For World Cities

Not sure if the tap water is safe to drink in a city youre traveling to?

Dont get sick when traveling for work or for vacation!

Check:

  • - Is it safe to drink?
  • - What do locals do?
  • - What are the local convenience stores?
  • - How much does a bottle of water cost?

Is Al Khobar Tap Water Safe to Drink?

Can You Drink Tap Water in Al Khobar?

Yes, tap water is drinkable.

According to WHO data, 99% of Saudi Arabia cities/towns and rural areas have access to improved water sources, that are available when needed.

World Health Organization with Safely Managed Drinking Water Services Map

How Do People In Al Khobar Rate The Water?

Travelers and residents of Al Khobar have rated the water quality and pollution as follows, according to subjective survey data.

A score of 100% is considered very high, and a score of 0% is very low. Please be cautious that "moderate to very high" water pollution is bad and the higher the rate of water quality the better.

Reminder:
Always take extra precautions, the water may be safe to drink when it leaves the sewage treatment plant but it may pick up pollutants during its way to your tap. We advise that you ask locals or hotel staff about the water quality. Also, note that different cities have different water mineral contents.

If you have found a spelling error, please, notify us by selecting that text and pressing Ctrl+Enter.
